description: This file defines a REST API controller for handling chat conversations and messages, including endpoints to start conversations, retrieve specific conversations, list conversations with filtering, post messages, and read messages within conversations.

classes.name: ChatController
classes.description: Spring REST Controller managing chat conversations and message endpoints.

methods.name: startConversation
methods.description: Creates a new chatbot conversation for a passenger and returns the created conversation.

methods.name: getConversation
methods.description: Fetches a single conversation by its UUID.

methods.name: listConversations
methods.description: Lists existing conversations with optional filtering by passengerId, supporting pagination.

methods.name: postMessage
methods.description: Adds a message to an existing conversation, with message details provided in the request body.

methods.name: getMessages
methods.description: Retrieves messages within a conversation, optionally filtered by timestamp and limited in number.
